formatted_address: 83 Punggol Central, #02-23 Waterway Point West Wing, Singapore 828761
name: Genki Sushi (Waterway Point)

reviews.text: Another great dining experience at genki sushi. Sushi comes out quick and freshly made. The frequent special, unique offerings keep things fresh and interesting. Still a great fan of their bullet train delivery system, much better than the continuously moving train belt with sushi on display for who knows how long and handled by who knows who. Lovely outlet. Will definitely be back.

Dear Genki Sushi Waterway Point Team,

I would like to take a moment to express my heartfelt appreciation for the wonderful dining experience I recently had at your restaurant.

From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the warm and attentive service provided by your staff. Everyone was courteous, efficient, and made sure that my visit was comfortable and enjoyable. The sushi was exceptionally fresh and delicious — each dish was beautifully prepared and tasted amazing. It is clear that great care and pride go into both the food and the service at your outlet.

Dining at Genki Sushi Waterway Point is always a pleasure, and it is because of dedicated teams like yours that customers like me keep coming back. Thank you for maintaining such high standards. I look forward to my next visit and will certainly continue recommending your restaurant to family and friends.

Keep up the excellent work!

We arrived at 6pm and didn’t have to wait long for a table. The service was efficient, and the staff quickly cleared our plates. However, the food today was somewhat disappointing. The sushi rice wasn’t packed tightly, causing it to crumble when picked up. Overall, a quick meal in the neighborhood.
Overall the food were good. Just that we are sitting behind a fan n keep blowing at us. Lol.

Decent japanese foods that will satisfy your raw fish cravings.

It is what it is, reasonably priced sushi and sashimi.  Dont go comparing Genki with higher end places or even Japan.

I would come back, not because its the best, but because its decent and consistent.

vicinity: 83 Punggol Central, #02-23 Waterway Point West Wing
